discussion_comments.comment_body:
It's hard to find any references around this (it's not even mentioned in the in-progress 1.17 release notes), but assuming this works like the other directives, there should not be a space between `//` and `go`. As currently written I think this directive is being entirely ignored by the compiler.
Also, `go:build` and `+build` have completely different syntaxes. https://go.googlesource.com/proposal/+/master/design/draft-gobuild.md

```suggestion
//go:build (js && wasm) || windows
```
